name: prompt-refiner
description: Refine prompts with style-specific variants - concise, detailed, creative, or analytical. Auto-displays comparison interface when all variants are saved.

tools.name: refinePrompt
tools.description: Store a prompt and get refinement guidance for different styles

tools.name: saveVariant
tools.description: Save a refined prompt variant - auto-displays when all 4 styles are saved

tools.name: displayVariants
tools.description: Manually display saved variants in a visual React artifact (usually not needed due to auto-display)

tools.name: diffPrompt
tools.description: Show differences between original and refined prompt with color-coded diff view

tools.name: acceptVariant
tools.description: Record that the user chose a specific variant and display confirmation

tools.name: getHistory
tools.description: Retrieve history of refined prompts and decisions as React artifact
